column1: Topic title: Court details how Sabah Umno man lobbied Najib for

column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/379104Court details how Sabah Umno man lobbied Najib for jobs14 April 2017A written judgment that disclosed how Penampang Umno division leader John Ambrose used his position of influence and good relationship with Prime Minister cum Finance Minister Najib Abdul Razak to help secure projects related to UMS Sabah has raised eyebrows among the legal circle.The Court of Appeal judgment by justice Tengku Maimun Tuan Mat, last month, showed how Ambrose met Najib twice, met with the PM's other officers and then Higher Education Minister Khaled Nordin (in court judgment written as Nordin Khalid) to secure the projects for Asli Jati Engineering Sdn Bhd and its director Peter Anthony, whom he sued.The projects in question are the electrical and mechanical maintenance work for Universiti Malaysia Sabah in Labuan (Labuan UMS project) and a comprehensive mechanical, civil and engineering maintenance work for UMS Sabah Phase 2 in Kota Kinabalu (KK UMS project) through direct negotiations, sometime between 2009 and 2010...For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access).
